thread.title: Multi-separation recycling plant opens in Auckland
thread.title_full: Multi-separation recycling plant opens in Auckland

title: Multi-separation recycling plant opens in Auckland
text:
Multi-separation recycling plant opens in Auckland 
Friday 24 Jul 2015 1:07 p.m. 
Construction and building waste makes up nearly half of what's in our landfills, but a new Auckland facility will change this. 
The country's largest resource recovery plant has been officially opened in Onehunga. 
It will provide new uses for building waste so raw materials can be recycled. 
Worth $10 million, it is Australasia's only multi-separation recycling plant. 
3 News
